Class ModuleController

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.controller.ModuleController
@RestController public class ModuleController extends Object
REST controller for managing course modules.

Provides endpoints for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting course modules.

See Also:

  • UserService

  • Constructor Details

      public ModuleController()

  • Method Details

    • findModuleByIdAsStudent

      @GetMapping("/module/{moduleId}") @PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") public ApiRes<Res<Object>> findModuleByIdAsStudent(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID moduleId)
      Retrieves a specific course module by its ID for an authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the ModuleService.findCourseModuleById(User, UUID) method, and returns the requested module details.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      moduleId - the ID of the module to retrieve
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing the module details as an Object

    • addModuleToCourse

      @PostMapping("/instructor/course/{courseId}/add-module") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> addModuleToCourse(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ModuleDto dto)
      Adds a new module to a specific course as an instructor.

      Extracts the instructor's information from the JWT, invokes the ModuleService.addModuleToCourse(User, UUID, ModuleDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful addition.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the instructor's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to add the module to
      dto - the module creation request payload containing module details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • updateModule

      @PutMapping("/instructor/update-module/{moduleId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> updateModule(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID moduleId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ModuleDto dto)
      Updates an existing course module as an instructor.

      Extracts the instructor's information from the JWT, invokes the ModuleService.updateCourseModule(User, UUID, ModuleDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful update.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the instructor's authentication details
      moduleId - the ID of the module to update
      dto - the module update request payload containing updated module details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • deleteCourseModule

      @DeleteMapping("/instructor/delete-module/{moduleId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> deleteCourseModule(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID moduleId)
      Deletes a specific course module as an instructor.

      Extracts the instructor's information from the JWT, invokes the ModuleService.deleteCourseModule(User, UUID) method, and returns a response indicating successful deletion.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the instructor's authentication details
      moduleId - the ID of the module to delete
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message
